pr_title: SAK-43089 remove counter to display the time alert when using prev/next

timeline.message: SAK-43089 remove counter to display the time alert when using prev/next
SAK-43089 remove counter to display the time alert when using prev/next

timeline.bodyText: doautosave is always true, it seems. It gets set to true and nothing else touches it.
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Can I add a commit onto this, just doing some cleanup? Variables that are only accessed once, formatting all over the place. I can shorten this file and make it a lot clearer.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: I thought it was overridden from a JSP .... but I can't find any overrides. So sure, let's remove it. But I'd rather not dramatically re-format this JS .... it's super sensitive and this code is super prone to regressions
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: Yeah, looking at this it doesn't look like it's used, it looks like it has always been true. It's not passed in from deliverAssessment (SaveFormContentAsync) and if this is called it's going to be true. This is really hard to read code for sure.
replies.author: jonespm

replies.bodyText: I somewhat expected Codacy to catch this. It doesn't but it also really doesn't like this file. https://app.codacy.com/manual/sakaiproject/sakai/file/42082279127/issues/source?bid=16464702&fileBranchId=16464702
replies.author: jonespm
